name: Disrupting Shot
text: With a well-placed shot, you make it harder for a nearby opponent to cast spells.
benefit: If you ready an action to shoot an opponent casting a spell within 30 feet and successfully hit that opponent with a ranged attack, the concentration DC to successfully cast the spell is increased by +4.
staminaText: When you ready an action to shoot an opponent casting a spell, you can spend up to 3 stamina points. For each stamina point you spend, it increases the range from which you can successfully hit that opponent and gain the benefits of this feat by 10 feet (to a maximum of 60 feet).
text_zh: 通过准确的射击，你能够使近处的敌人更加难以施放法术。
prerequisites_zh: 敏捷13，近距射击，战士等级6。
benefit_zh: 如果你进行准备动作射击30尺内施法的敌人，并且成功以远程攻击命中该名敌人，那么该名敌人成功施放法术的专注DC提高4点。
staminaText_zh: 使用该专长时最多可花费3点耐力，每点耐力提升专长适用距离10尺，最多到60尺。
